content.rendered:
The Elangeni College consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Elangeni College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Elangeni College based on the information provided within it.

Elangeni College Student Portal

Note: Elangeni College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Elangeni College Prospectus 2025

The Elangeni College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.waterbergcollege.co.za.

Elangeni College PROSPECTUS 2025 – PDF DOWNLOAD
